item.title: RancherOSで全てのコンテナを削除する方法
item.description: docker rm -f $(docker ps -qa) sudo reboot sudo rm -rf /var/lib/rancher/state Refarence After remove a host from rancher, how to clean agent containers and iptable rules? - Rancher - Rancher Forums
